verses.content: Kum kuona kum, thla sâwm- na, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a;
“Mihriem naupa, hi ni hin Babulon lal chun Jerusalem a hung hnai a nih.
Chun, sûngkaw hel hmanghai kuoma chun tekhithu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih: Sumbepui inchuon unla, inchuon unla, A sûnga chun tui buok unla;
Chun, chutaka chun a sa tlinhai thlâk unla, A tlang ṭha deu deuhai, a mal le a dârhai le A ru tuihnâihai chun suksip ro.
Ran ruol laia ditumtak chu la unla, A ruhai chu a hnuoi tieng sie unla, Insoṭhattir hle unla, a ruhai chu but ro;

“Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Khawpui, thisen insuo hmang chu a chung a rik, sum- bepui a tuiêkna a sûnga um le, a tuiêkna khawm bo thei lo chu, a chung a rik! a tlang tlangin la suok rawh, thlang bik nei loin.
A thisen chu ama sûnga chun a um sih a, lungpui ruok chunga chun ân suoh a; pilvuta zuk vurkhum theina ding, leihnuoi chunga chun a bunthlâk si nawh a.
Phuba la dinga hung tlung dinga lunginsenna chu ân umtir theina dingin, a thisen chu lungpui ruok chunga chun kân suoh a, inkhum a ni nawna dingin.
Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Khawpui thisen insuo hmang chu a chung a rik! Kei khawma a thing sep khawm chu suklien ka ta.
Thing buk ṭeu la, mei ti chawk ṭha la, sa chu intlawk ṭhattir hle la, a tuihâng chu hâng deuin, a ruhai chu râw hmang ni raw se.

Chun, meiling chunga chun a ruokin inchuon la, a hung luma, a dârsen chu a hung inling theina dingin, chuongchun, ân thieng nawna chu a sûnga chun a hung intui theina dingin le, a tuiêkhai chu a hung kâng- hmang theina dingin.
Sâwl neng khawpa thaw hnung khawmin a tuiêkna chu amaa in- thawk chun a tlan hmang si nawh a; a tuiêkna chu mei khawma a sukbo thei nawh.
I pawrchenaa chun hurna a um a; ka sukfai cheh a, sukfaia i um naw leiin, i pawrchenaa inthawkin sukfai ni ngai ta hrim hrim naw ti ni, ka lunginsenna hi i chunga ka suk- lungâwi hmakhat chun.

Kei LALPA chun ka hril tah a, hung tlung ngei a ta, thaw khawm thâwng ka tih, kîr nâwk naw ning a, hla naw nîng a, insîr bawk naw ning; i um dânhai ang pei le i thilthawhai ang peiin ro rêlpêk an ti che, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.
LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung nâwk a:
“Mihriem naupa, ngai ta, thâwkkhatin i mithai châkna chu nangmaa inthawkin ka lâk hmang ding a nih; ṭap naw ti nih a, sûn bawk naw ti ni, i mitthlihai khawm luong thla bawk naw ni.

Inthuok huoi la, amiruokchu, inring loin, mithi ta ding chun sûnna siem naw la, i lukâwm chu kâwm la, i kehaia chun i kekawkhai chu bun la, i hmûrhai chu hup naw la, lusûntuhai bei chu fa naw rawh,” tiin.
Chuongchun, zîngkâr chun mi- puihai kuoma chun thu chu ka hril a, a zântieng chun ka nuhmei chu a thi tah a; chun, thu pêka ka um ang chun zîngkâr chun ka thaw tah a.
Chun, mipuihai chun ka kuoma chun, “Hieng thil i thawhai hi, keini ta dingin ieng am an niha i mi hril naw ding maw?” an ta.
Kei chun an kuomah, “LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

‘Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Ngai ta, ka hmun inthieng in thilthawtheina chapopui le, in mithai châkna, in lungrilin a hmangai chu ka sukhmingsiet ding a nih; chun, in naupasalhai le in nau nuhmeihai in hnunga in mâksanhai kha kâwlhnâmah tlung an ta.
Chun, ka thaw ta ang khan thâwng in ta; in hmûrhai chu inkhum naw ti niu a, mihriemhai bei chu fa bawk naw ti niu.
In lu haia chun in lukâwmhai chu kâwm in ta, in kekawkhai chu in kehai chun bun in ta; ṭap naw ti niu a, sûn bawk naw ti niu; amiruokchu, in suolnaa chun riral lem in ta, insûntuo lem in tih.
Chuongchun, Ezekiel hi in ta dingin inchikna nîng a ta; amain a thaw ang tak hin thaw vêng in tih; hienghai hi a hung tlung pha chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih.’
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, an kul det, an ropuina hlimna, an mithai châkna le, an lungril an sienahai, an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai ka lâk pha chun,
chu nia chun a pumpeltu chu i kuomah hungin a hung inhriettir naw ding che am a nih?

Chu nia chun chu a pumpeltu kuoma chun i bau chu ka tâng i ta, thu hril i ta, ṭawng theiloin um ta naw ti ni; chuongchun, an ta ding chun inchikna nîng i ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.
